Tasks.Task Description: Gather detailed requirements for network security, connectivity, and scalability. Identify the applications and services that will use Azure vWAN Secure Hub.
Design the network architecture, including hub locations, spoke connections, and integration with existing on-premises and Azure networks.
Set up the Azure Virtual WAN resource in the Azure portal, ensuring proper configuration of hubs and spokes.
Enable the Secure Hub feature in Azure Firewall Manager and configure security policies for traffic filtering and inspection.
Apply security best practices such as enabling Azure Firewall, configuring threat intelligence-based filtering, and setting up logging for traffic analysis.
Connect on-premises networks and branch offices to Azure Virtual WAN using VPN or ExpressRoute connections.
Set up routing policies to direct traffic through the Secure Hub for inspection and filtering.
Perform thorough testing of the network connectivity and security policies, including failover scenarios and traffic filtering.
Set up monitoring and alerting using Azure Monitor and Firewall Manager to track network performance and security events.
Document the network architecture, configurations, and operational procedures for future reference and training.
Ensure the setup meets all regulatory compliance requirements. Implement regular auditing procedures to verify compliance and security postures.
Conduct training sessions for the operations team on managing and troubleshooting the Azure vWAN Secure Hub setup.
